summary.span: 在没有直接操作访问控制列表 (ACL) 的情况下，提供对对象的访问控制权限。

span.span: Provides the ability to control access to objects without direct manipulation of Access Control Lists (ACLs).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回当前在内存中的安全描述符信息。This method returns the security descriptor information currently in memory. 它不会检索到永久性存储中保存的信息。It does not retrieve information saved in permanent storage.

protected: abstract bool ModifyAccess(System::Security::AccessControl::AccessControlModification modification, System::Security::AccessControl::AccessRule ^ rule, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % modified);

param.name: modification
param.span: 要应用于 DACL 的修改。

span.span: The modification to apply to the DACL.

param.name: rule
param.span: 要修改的访问规则。

span.span: The access rule to modify.

param.name: modified
param.span: 如果已成功修改 DACL，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the DACL is successfully modified; otherwise, .

summary.span: 将指定的修改应用到与此 对象关联的自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 中。

span.span: Applies the specified modification to the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object.

returns.span: 如果已成功修改 DACL，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the DACL is successfully modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免无意中允许主体访问，应用程序应检查是否存在允许每个人都完全访问权限 (AEFA) 访问控制项 (ACE)，并将其删除才能修改 DACL。To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.

param.name: includeSections
param.span: 枚举值之一，该值指定要保存的安全对象的安全描述符（访问规则、审核规则、所有者和主要组）的部分。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the sections of the security descriptor (access rules, audit rules, owner, primary group) of the securable object to save.

summary.span: 将与此 对象关联的安全描述符的指定部分保存到永久存储中。

span.span: Saves the specified sections of the security descriptor associated with this object to permanent storage.

summary.span: 我们建议传递给构造函数和 persist 方法的 参数的值应完全相同。

span.span: We recommend that the values of the parameters passed to the constructor and persist methods be identical.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 保存时对象，如果的值`includeSections`参数传递给方法并不完全相同的值`includeSections`参数传递给构造函数用于创建该对象、 部分持久化对象可包含不可预知的值。When persisting a object, if the value of the `includeSections` parameter passed to the method is not identical to the value of the `includeSections` parameter passed to the constructor used to create that object, sections of the persisted object can contain unpredictable values. 例如，如果与调用构造函数`includeSections`的值，和更高版本对该对象调用方法`includeSections`的值，则产生的保持对象将包含其审核规则、 组和所有者的不可预知的值。For example, if a constructor is called with an `includeSections` value of , and later a method is called on that object with an `includeSections` value of , the resulting persisted object will contain unpredictable values for its audit rules, group, and owner.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetAccessRuleProtection (bool isProtected, bool preserveInheritance);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetAccessRuleProtection(bool isProtected, bool preserveInheritance) cil managed
Public Sub SetAccessRuleProtection (isProtected As Boolean, preserveInheritance As Boolean)
public: void SetAccessRuleProtection(bool isProtected, bool preserveInheritance);

param.name: isProtected
param.span: 若为 ，则保护与此 对象关联的访问规则不被继承；若为 ，则允许继承。

span.span: to protect the access rules associated with this object from inheritance; to allow inheritance.

param.name: preserveInheritance
param.span: 若为 ，则保留继承的访问规则；若为 ，则删除继承的访问规则。

span.span: to preserve inherited access rules; to remove inherited access rules.

param.span: 如果 isProtected 为 ，则忽略此参数。

span.span: This parameter is ignored if isProtected is .

summary.span: 设置或删除与此 对象相关联的访问规则保护。

span.span: Sets or removes protection of the access rules associated with this object.

summary.span: 父级对象不能通过继承来修改受保护的访问规则。

span.span: Protected access rules cannot be modified by parent objects through inheritance.

exception.span: 此方法尝试从非标准自定义访问控制列表 (DACL) 中删除继承的规则。

span.span: This method attempts to remove inherited rules from a non-canonical Discretionary Access Control List (DACL).

span.span: Protected audit rules cannot be modified by parent objects through inheritance.

exception.span: 此方法尝试从非规范化系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 中删除继承的规则。

span.span: This method attempts to remove inherited rules from a non-canonical System Access Control List (SACL).

param.name: identity

span.span: The owner to set.

summary.span: 设置与此 对象关联的安全描述符的所有者。

span.span: Sets the owner for the security descriptor associated with this object.

summary.span: 根据指定的二进制数据设置此 对象的安全说明符。

span.span: Sets the security descriptor for this object from the specified binary data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果由二进制数据的安全描述符包含`null`其自由访问控制列表 (DACL)，允许每个人的单一访问控制项 (ACE) 的完全访问权限 (AEFA) 添加到 DACL。If the security descriptor represented by the binary data contains `null` for its discretionary access control list (DACL), a single access control entry (ACE) that allows everyone full access (AEFA) is added to the DACL. 如果应用程序修改 AEFA ACE 已添加到其中的安全描述符的 DACL，如果该 DACL 保持不变 DACL 中随 AEFA ACE。If an application modifies the DACL of a security descriptor to which an AEFA ACE has been added, the AEFA ACE is persisted with the DACL when that DACL is persisted. 这可能导致无意中允许主体访问的应用程序。This can result in an application unintentionally allowing access to principals. 正因为如此，应用程序应检查存在 AEFA ACE 的并将其删除才能修改任何安全描述符。Because of this, an application should check for the existence of an AEFA ACE and remove it before modifying any security descriptor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm(unsigned int8[] binaryForm) cil managed

param.name: binaryForm
param.span: 要根据其设置安全描述符的字节数组。

summary.span: 根据指定的字节值数组设置此 对象的安全描述符。

span.span: Sets the security descriptor for this object from the specified array of byte values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果由二进制数据的安全描述符包含`null`其自由访问控制列表 (DACL)，允许每个人的单一访问控制项 (ACE) 的完全访问权限 (AEFA) 添加到 DACL。If the security descriptor represented by the binary data contains `null` for its discretionary access control list (DACL), a single access control entry (ACE) that allows everyone full access (AEFA) is added to the DACL. 如果应用程序修改 AEFA ACE 已添加到其中的安全描述符的 DACL，如果该 DACL 保持不变 DACL 中随 AEFA ACE。If an application modifies the DACL of a security descriptor to which an AEFA ACE has been added, the AEFA ACE is persisted with the DACL when that DACL is persisted. 这可能导致无意中允许主体访问的应用程序。This can result in an application unintentionally allowing access to principals. 正因为如此，应用程序应检查存在 AEFA ACE 的并将其删除才能修改任何安全描述符。Because of this, an application should check for the existence of an AEFA ACE and remove it before modifying any security descriptor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果由二进制数据的安全描述符包含`null`其自由访问控制列表 (DACL)，允许每个人的单一访问控制项 (ACE) 的完全访问权限 (AEFA) 添加到 DACL。If the security descriptor represented by the binary data contains `null` for its discretionary access control list (DACL), a single access control entry (ACE) that allows everyone full access (AEFA) is added to the DACL. 如果应用程序修改 AEFA ACE 已添加到其中的安全描述符的 DACL，如果该 DACL 保持不变 DACL 中随 AEFA ACE。If an application modifies the DACL of a security descriptor to which an AEFA ACE has been added, the AEFA ACE is persisted with the DACL when that DACL is persisted. 这可能导致无意中允许主体访问的应用程序。This can result in an application unintentionally allowing access to principals. 正因为如此，应用程序应检查存在 AEFA ACE 的并将其删除才能修改任何安全描述符。Because of this, an application should check for the existence of an AEFA ACE and remove it before modifying any security descriptor.

summary.span: 根据指定的安全描述符定义语言 (SDDL) 字符串设置此 对象的安全描述符。
